question: What is the profession of Barry John, who is recently selected for Lifetime Achievement honour in 2020 META Awards?
explanation:
Renowned theatre director and mentor Barry John has been selected for Lifetime Achievement honour for 2020 at the Mahindra Excellence in Theatre Awards (META).
The 76-year-old teacher of several Bollywood stars will be conferred with the award during the 15th META festival. Barry John is a published author and recipient of Sangeet Natak Akademi award. He has also acted in several critically-acclaimed films.
